etymology.description: 日(日) (rì, "sun") + 丂(丂) (kǎo, "breath") + 彡(彡) (xiǎn, "rays of light") = rays of the sun shining over a tree branch
etymology.interpretation: The character 昜(yáng) portrays the concept of the sun's rays shining down, symbolized by 日(日) (rì, "sun") with 丂(丂) representing a tree branch and 彡(彡) depicting the sun's rays. This compound visually encapsulates the light given off by the sun.

examples.chinese: 日光照耀下时(日光照耀下時)，旗帜高昜飘扬(旗幟高昜飄揚)。
examples.pinyin: Rìguāng zhàoyào xià shí, qízhì gāo yáng piāoyáng.
examples.english: Under the shining sunlight, the flag is raised high.

examples.chinese: 风儿吹过柳梢时(風兒吹過柳梢時)，心中的梦想也随昜起(心中的夢想也隨昜起)。
examples.pinyin: Fēng ér chuīguò liǔ shāo shí, xīn zhōng de mèngxiǎng yě suí yáng qǐ.
examples.english: As the wind passes the tips of the willows, the dreams in the heart rise as well.
